## IResult interface

The base interface definition for the `Result` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IResult<TReturned = any, TResultCallback = any, TValidate = any> extends Event 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Event

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [callback?](./base.iresult.callback.md) | [CallbackFunction](./base.callbackfunction.md)&lt;TReturned, [IResult](./base.iresult.md)&lt;TReturned&gt;, TResultCallback, [IResult](./base.iresult.md)&lt;TResultCallback&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> This function is user-defined, and will be called when a specified result is called |
|  [data?](./base.iresult.data.md) | TReturned | <i>(Optional)</i> A field containing any values returned from the function call |
|  [instanceId?](./base.iresult.instanceid.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A string ID used in identifying if the object is a result |
|  [isValidated?](./base.iresult.isvalidated.md) | boolean &#124; null | <i>(Optional)</i> An indicator specifying the last results of isValidated. If it has not been validated yet, return null |
|  [validate](./base.iresult.validate.md) | TValidate | A function call to validate if the result is a success or failure |
